medical_history.chief_complaint: Short stature and severe lower limb deformities
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Both siblings were referred for evaluation, indicating the presence of symptoms related to short stature and limb deformities since early childhood.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The mother's maternal grandfather had disharmonic dwarfism, excruciating bone pain, waddling gait, and moderate genu varum deformity of the lower limbs.
medical_history.family_history: The mother's maternal grandfather had hereditary conditions related to dwarfism and bone deformities.
